greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of deficiency of n (A033879) and its Dirichlet inverse.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: DirInverse(v) = { my(u=vector(#v)); u[1] = (1/v[1]); for(n=2, #v, u[n] = -sumdiv(n, d, if(d<n, v[n/d]*u[d], 0))); (u) }; \\ Compute the Dirichlet inverse of the sequence given in input vector v.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 12 2019
